title: Confessions Of A Small Town Librarian
description: Join small town librarian, Anna McCall on an incredible journey full of temptation, romance and confessions as she uncovers some secrets that could change her town forever. Along the way she meets the hot and hunky Ben who shows her that librarians can be so nice at being naughty too.*Please note that this the first novella in the Confession series. It is erotica, if you do not like to read erotica, this book is not for you.
author: A. McEwan
